document.full_text: mortgage finance giant freddie mac  on wednesday said it lost just short of a billion dollars last quarter, though it did not ask taxpayers for more aid as the loss stemmed from interest payments to the government.
document.title: freddie mac loses $929 million
lines_and_colors: mortgage finance giant freddie mac  on wednesday said it lost just short of a billion dollars last quarter, though it did not ask taxpayers for more aid as the loss stemmed from interest payments to the government.
